title: Confidence interval for mean muffler repair cost

content.prompt: A random sample of the costs of repair jobs at a large muffler repair shop produces a mean of $127.95. and a standard deviation of $24.03. If the size of this sample is 40, which of the following is an approximate 90 percent confidence interval for the average cost of a repair at this repair shop?

topic.text: 7.2: Constructing a Confidence Interval for a Population Mean

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Construct a confidence interval, provided conditions for inference are met.
